title: Will repurchase!
author: Jay F.
body: For me this is a perfect liner. The fine point and lack of creaminess (or smudging) allow me to get in between the lashes for subtle depth with just a hint of green. Another great product from CanMake.

title: 04 Garnet Burgundy - Excellent product!
author: Elle
body:
This is my all time favourite eyeliner! Itâ€™s so creamy, glides on beautifully and stays on. Easy to blend if you want to, no smudging and no skin prep needed. I have a fair few fine lines under my eyes and the product never travels into them.

The cartridge is very thin, 1.5mm according to the package but seems thinner, so itâ€™s easy to create a fine wing if desired. (Iâ€™ve included a swatch photo to show the thickness and how it looks blended out.)

Be careful not to wind it up more than 1mm at a time to avoid it breaking off. Iâ€™d say there is only approximately 3-4 cms of product, so not much but itâ€™s still definitely worth the price.

Iâ€™ve purchased the colour â€˜04 Garnet
Burgundyâ€™ twice. Itâ€™s very true to its name, a very flattering reddish burgundy that really compliments hazel/green/brown eyes. (Iâ€™ve tried to capture the colour in a few different lights.)

I will be so sad if they ever stop making this - I searched so long for this exact colour and nothing about it disappoints.

UPDATE: Still obsessed with this eyeliner and use it daily. Iâ€™m now on my 4th and 5th order but can only review once :)

title: Feedback
author: Greg Williams
body: Very nice color will purchase again.

title: Staying power and then pigment
author: johnauthy
body:
4.7 stars. Got the black. So far, so great! I tested my eyeliner by leaving it on overnight (I know, kinda gross- donâ€™t judge) but I have hooded eyelids and oily skin (and my eyes get watery in the am) so I use all of that to test the staying power on my eyeliners. They need to be smudge proof, budge proof, and water proof. And so far, this one is doing so good. Another thing, pigment is excellent- very black. Ease of glide was good too, not super creamy but not hard to put on either. The thinness of the pencil makes it super easy to draw my winged eyes. Buuuut, that is also the reason I would take off .3 stars. Since it is so thin I donâ€™t know how long this eyeliner will last me and wonder if I would have to buy another one sooner rather than later, you know?! Value matters. But quality can trump it- even just a little hehe. Also, if the maker of this product could make a fatter version of this exact eyeliner, I would buy that too. It would make filling in parts of my eyeliner more easy and I wouldnâ€™t feel like Iâ€™m overusing my thin pencil.

Will update again once I use it some more. (Photo is after overnight test)
